title: Concrete Waste Recycling Project to be implemented by the State Engineering Corporation of Sri Lanka
decision_details: - The State Engineering Corporation of Sri Lanka has proposed to implement a pilot project for recycling concrete and construction waste. Elements obtained through the recycling of concrete and construction waste under this project have been planned to be utilized in the production of suitable products and combined with raw materials sourced directly from natural resources. The machinery of the proposed project has been identified as suitable for installation at the precast concrete yard of the Ekala Industrial Estate of the State Engineering Corporation of Sri Lanka. Accordingly, the the proposal made by the Minister of Urban Development, Construction and Housing to implement the proposed Project by utilizing the provisions of Rs.200 million allocated to the Ministry under the "Clean Sri Lanka" programme, was approved by the Cabinet.
